sentences.en: As a class of the most important dredging equipment , Cutter Suction Dredger ( CSD ) is dredging projects.
sentences.cn: “新海虎”是我国迄今为止自行设计 、 建造的最大耙吸式挖泥船.

sentences.en: Back of the breakwater the dredger was working.
sentences.cn: 在防波堤后面挖泥船正在工作.

sentences.en: Because its high efficiency and low cost, fusion process is an ideal processfor dredger repair.
sentences.cn: 覆层法能降低成本,提高劳动效率, 是目前绞刀制造及修复中较理想的方法.

sentences.en: Instrument of horizontal sedimentation tank and fabrication setting ( purchasing of suction dredger, retainer and spare parts )
sentences.cn: 平流沉淀池设备及结构安装 ( 吸泥机 、 隔栅和配件购买 )

sentences.en: Our main products are electric drill, marble cutter, angle grinder, rotary hammer, pipe dredger, etc.
sentences.cn: 主要产品有手电钻 、 石材切割机 、 角向磨光机 、 电锤 、 管道疏通器等.

sentences.en: The slurry pump is one of the key facilities of a dredger.
sentences.cn: 泥泵是水力输送式挖泥船的关键设备.

sentences.en: We main manufacture: dredger , sand pumping vessel , sand filter , transporter, sand selecting equipment, conveyer belt, etc.
sentences.cn: 公司主要生产: 挖沙船、抽沙船 、 筛沙机 、 运输船 、 沙石精选设备 、 输送带、磁选机 、 等矿山机械设备.

words.tran_cn: （用挖泥船等）疏浚；（用拖捞网等）捞取；（在食物上）撒（面粉等）
[船]挖泥船；[水运]疏浚机；挖泥机；[食品]撒粉器

trans.tran_en: a machine or ship used for digging or removing mud and sand from the bottom of a river, lake etc
